name: Twisted Maze
description:
Escape the Twisted Maze as fast as you can. Beware, one way leads to salvation, and the other leads to demise.

Default Controls

WSAD - movement

Spacebar - jump

Mouse - move camera

First Core Game. Developed for Core Game Creator Challenge.

Team LanaLux.

Game link: https://www.coregames.com/games/96c35d/twisted-maze
